sys_openapi_operation.name: Retrieves a blank, not-yet-persisted asset based on the given templateId or templateName.
sys_openapi_operation.serialized_operation: {"fName":"Retrieves a blank, not-yet-persisted asset based on the given templateId or templateName.","fOperationId":"getBlankAsset","fDescription":"This API returns a blank asset card based on a specific template. You can add the id or name of the specific template as a parameter to the endpoint (templateid / templateName). The result will show all the fields on the card, and their properties. You can use this endpoint to see the mandatory fields of the asset, and with that, create new assets of that type.","fPath":"/assetmgmt/assets/blank","fHttpMethod":"GET","fDeprecated":false,"fResponses":[{"fStatusCode":"200","fDescription":"On successful query","fContents":[{"fMediaType":"application/json","fSchema":{"fName":"responseapplicationjson4812529035","fReferencedName":"#/components/schemas/FrontendAsset","fExclusiveMaximum":false,"fExclusiveMinimum":false,"fUniqueItems":false,"fRequired":[],"fEnum":[],"fProperties":[],"fOneOf":[],"fNullable":false,"fReadOnly":false,"fWriteOnly":false,"fDeprecated":false,"fGlideType":"object"}}],"fHeaders":[]},{"fStatusCode":"400","fDescription":"When both templateId and templateName are given but they point to different templates, or when neither of them is given.","fContents":[],"fHeaders":[]},{"fStatusCode":"403","fDescription":"When user doesn\u0027t have \u0027read\u0027 permission for the asset type.","fContents":[],"fHeaders":[]}],"fParameters":[{"fName":"templateId","fDescription":"ID of the template","fRequired":false,"fDeprecated":false,"fAllowEmptyValue":false,"fAllowReserved":false,"fParameterType":"query","fExplode":false,"fStyle":"form","fContents":[{"fSchema":{"fName":"templateId7147246420","fExclusiveMaximum":false,"fExclusiveMinimum":false,"fUniqueItems":false,"fRequired":[],"fEnum":[],"fType":"string","fProperties":[],"fOneOf":[],"fNullable":false,"fReadOnly":false,"fWriteOnly":false,"fDeprecated":false,"fGlideType":"string"}}]},{"fName":"templateName","fDescription":"Name of the template","fRequired":false,"fDeprecated":false,"fAllowEmptyValue":false,"fAllowReserved":false,"fParameterType":"query","fExplode":false,"fStyle":"form","fContents":[{"fSchema":{"fName":"templateName4032586759","fExclusiveMaximum":false,"fExclusiveMinimum":false,"fUniqueItems":false,"fRequired":[],"fEnum":[],"fType":"string","fProperties":[],"fOneOf":[],"fNullable":false,"fReadOnly":false,"fWriteOnly":false,"fDeprecated":false,"fGlideType":"string"}}]}]}
sys_openapi_operation.sys_name: Retrieves a blank, not-yet-persisted asset based on the given templateId or templateName.
